title: Good news for the people of Oodua Republic
content: After many years of incessant suffering, poverty and lack of progress at the hands of selfish and callous politicians at the helm, the people finally rose up to take back their destinies. The outcome of the courageous step by the benevolent people of the former Western Nigeria led to a the placement of a new system that plunge the people into economic growth and prosperity.
